author: Masamune Okami

text:
Possibly the most satisfying series I own. Though it sadly keeps getting easier and the game play as a result is always shortened. I saved over my original file of going commando a bunch of times and had to beat it all over again just for the sack of it... never fully upgraded every weapon (as a result of having to replay them).
The titles are always so clever.

author: ParrotMan01

text: awww yeah, I sure can remember this one. R&C are cool games. Though, all of the games got some down times which just don't make too much fun. However, overall  the games are the best Action-Jump&Run-Games I could imagine and recommend. I hope the games, if there come new ones, are not made too "cute" because I like the way it has its comic-like graphics and still does not get ridicilous with the action part.

author: vfaulkon

text: Yes! Thank you for adding some of this music. It's top notch stuff! Very nostalgic. I will tell you this much, I didn't play past the 3rd game, which was still pretty great. From what I heard though the 4th wasn't the same. But it looks like the last few are pretty good. I've yet to play them as well. I'm a major fan of the series, and the second game is one of the best games I've played period.
